html:
2025-0524
2025-06-20PMOOther Than Statutory AuthorityOrder directing that a Commission do issue under the Great Seal of Canada empowering any person appointed as Clerk of the Privy Council and Secretary to the CabinetOrder directing that a Commission do issue under the Great Seal of Canada empowering any person appointed as Clerk of the Privy Council and Secretary to the Cabinet, including Michael Jonathan Sabia, O.C., to administer, to any person who holds or is authorized to hold office, or who may be appointed to discharge any duty, on behalf of the Government of Canada, the Oath of Allegiance and the Oath of Office, and any other oath as may from time to time be prescribed by law, and to have that power during their tenure of office as Clerk of the Privy Council and Secretary to the Cabinet, effective July 7, 2025.N/A
subject: Order directing that a Commission do issue under the Great Seal of Canada empowering any person appointed as Clerk of the Privy Council and Secretary to the Cabinet
precis: Order directing that a Commission do issue under the Great Seal of Canada empowering any person appointed as Clerk of the Privy Council and Secretary to the Cabinet, including Michael Jonathan Sabia, O.C., to administer, to any person who holds or is authorized to hold office, or who may be appointed to discharge any duty, on behalf of the Government of Canada, the Oath of Allegiance and the Oath of Office, and any other oath as may from time to time be prescribed by law, and to have that power during their tenure of office as Clerk of the Privy Council and Secretary to the Cabinet, effective July 7, 2025.
